query: The subset of activities 20, 25, 13, 23 is not completed at the same time period
p:17/13: activity 13 must be completed before starting activity 17
p:22/17: activity 17 must be completed before starting activity 22
p:31/22: activity 22 must be completed before starting activity 31
p:32/31: activity 31 must be completed before starting activity 32
m: extends the length of the project beyond time period 38
